focs/b_field_z/validity_timed.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: focs/b_field_z/validity_timed
IDS: focs
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: focs/b_field_z
FIELD_NAME: validity_timed
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: focs -> b_field_z -> validity_timed

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[focs]: Fiber Optic Current Sensor (FOCS)
CONTAINER[focs/b_field_z]: Vertical component of the magnetic field on each point of the FOCS outline

PARENT_CONTAINER: focs/b_field_z
FIELD_NAME: validity
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: focs -> b_field_z -> validity

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[focs]: Fiber Optic Current Sensor (FOCS)
CONTAINER[focs/b_field_z]: Vertical component of the magnetic field on each point of the FOCS outline
